# system(_:design:)

**Type Method**

Gets a system font with the given text style and design.

## Declaration

```swift
static func system(_ style: Font.TextStyle, design: Font.Design = .default) -> Font
```

## Deprecated symbols

- **system(size:weight:design:)**: Specifies a system font to use, along with the style, weight, and any design parameters you want applied to the text.
